summary: Provides a collection of helper utilities used by the Terraform parser to evaluate expressions, convert string representations into native data types, and manipulate collection structures such as maps, lists, and sets. Includes functions for type casting, merging structures, concatenating values, and handling dynamic placeholders during static analysis.
business_intent: Enable accurate parsing and interpretation of Terraform configuration files by supplying conversion and dataâ€‘structure helpers that the analysis engine can rely on when evaluating expressions and resolving dynamic values.
